attributes.review: This app is the most terrible disturbing app I have ever gotten.  I am very disappointed with the way the app is set up and it just makes me very disturbed knowing apple would even let this app be able to be on people iPhones😪. Do better apple 😔.
attributes.title: Very terrible app

attributes.review: Must use your phone number to sign up? No thanks. Text is small and inconsistent. Switches between a flush left and centered design randomly. Difficult to navigate and the images chosen are of bad quality and unprofessional looking. Honestly, this app disgusts me.
attributes.title: Horrible Design

attributes.review: Every time I opened the app a demon would eat my soul and I couldn’t prevent it from happening a good president wouldn’t send a demon to eat people’s souls. The over all experience was quite horrible and I wouldn’t recommend it
attributes.title: I would give it zero stars if I could

attributes.review: I thought this app was for Cheetos! Boy oh boy let me tell you! This app doesn’t offer the Cheeto life style. Just a man cosplaying as the fat puffy ones. And I heard he put his dust near a 13 year old girl!?!?? Like boo boo noooooooooooo! Time to throw away that stale bag of packing peanuts and move onto something a little Spicy 😉
attributes.title: My Cheetos were not SPICY!

attributes.review: Where do I even start? There was a credit card hacker as tech support when I couldn’t get the Cheeto pictures off my screen and now I’ve received a bible in the mail every day! HORRENDOUS! Not even to mention racism, sexism, and homophobia. All around xenophobic app. And that’s on PERIODT 💅🏻
attributes.title: Too much orange!

attributes.review: Got this app to see when the next rally was and to get tickets. The app keeps booting me off every single time. Waste of time, memory space and money. Especially since it was made by a disgusting, horrid and downright vile human pile of burning trash.
attributes.title: Awful app! Always glitching 😤

attributes.review: First of all when I opened the app I was greeted with a horrible picture of the president, I believe that his campaign on this is completely horrible. I believe it is just sad that we are supporting this. Apple should delete this app immediately.
attributes.title: This app is horrible

attributes.review:
hello my name is gabbie Hannah😁❤️ AND THIS IS THE WORST APP EVER TO EXIST I opened the app to a ATROCIOUS STENCH 🤢🤢🤢💃💃 MY NOSE ALMOST FELL OFF😭😭😭😭😭I completely ignored it though... attributes.title: tiny Cheeto penis

attributes.review: I didn’t get this app to see the big cheeto baby naked. But you can’t escape trumps nudes in this app. Horrific. I had to schedule therapy sessions to help with the trauma of seeing trumps little peen. I feel like calling it little is too generous for the actual size of it.
attributes.title: Going to therapy because of this app.

attributes.review: this man is a disgusting pedofile and anyone who supports him have mental issues or have a kindergarten education. this man is the the stupidest imbecile person i’ve ever heard of and is not fit to be president at all. he is literally a old greasy old man that wears a suit to cover his lack of education and empathy. he destroys family’s and anyone who would let a man like this rule is blinded by their own hatred against other that are different to them to see that he is not a good president or person.
attributes.title: kick him out of office already
